title: Standard error for genetic modified food survey

content.question: Which of the following is the standard error used to construct a confidence interval for the difference between the proportions of all adults who are not scientists and all adults who are scientists who would answer yes to the question?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator 0.37 times 0.63, and denominator 2,002, end fraction, plus the fraction with numerator 0.88 times 0.12, and denominator 3,748, end fraction, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.37</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.63</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>002</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.88</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>748</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator 0.37 times 0.63, and denominator 2,002, end fraction, end root, plus the fraction with numerator 0.88 times 0.12, and denominator 3,748, end fraction, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.37</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.63</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>002</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.88</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>748</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator 0.70 times 0.30, and denominator 2,002, end fraction, end root, plus the fraction with numerator 0.70 times 0.30, and denominator 3,748, end fraction, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.70</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.30</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>002</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.70</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.30</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>748</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.8: Confidence Intervals for the Difference of Two Proportions

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
